title: Alubarna - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed information about the capital city of Arabasta.
informationGathered: Location: Northeast Arabasta, on a plateau near an oasis
Access: Five entrance stairways at different cardinal directions
Palace: 4000 years old, predates the kingdom
City plan: Similar to Abbasid-era Iraq design
